div.div: #FINISHSTRONG to receive this FREE T-shirt. Please read for more details.
Student Lunch Accounts / Free or Reduced Lunch

April 1, 2020 Dear Parent/Guardian: Weld RE-5J is contacting you to try to help alleviate some burdens associated with the COVID-19 furloughs, layoffs or drop in pay. At this point your student is a full pay student for meals; some with very high balances owed. We have been emailing charge notices each week to the email address associated with the guardian of each student. We are thankful to those who have kept their students’ accounts current.
